message.title: Understanding Corruption
message.description: A comprehensive overview of corruption, including its definition, types (grand, petty, systemic), and far-reaching consequences on individuals, societies, and economies.

resources.title: Corruption: What It Is and How to Fight It
resources.description: This book provides an in-depth analysis of corruption, its types, and strategies to combat it.

resources.title: The Impact of Corruption on Economic Development
resources.description: An article discussing how corruption affects economic growth and societal trust.

multipleChoiceQuestions.question: What is the definition of corruption?

options.text: Abuse of power for personal gain
The promotion of fairness and equity
An economic incentive for public officials

multipleChoiceQuestions.explanation: Corruption is typically defined as the abuse of power by government officials for illicit gain, which undermines trust in public institutions.

multipleChoiceQuestions.question: Which type of corruption is characterized by small-scale bribery?
multipleChoiceQuestions.explanation: Petty corruption refers to small-scale bribery and corruption typically seen in day-to-day interactions between public officials and individuals.
